meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>master</kanji> <kanji>manager</kanji> rules over all of the other managers and he's in charge of their <vocabulary>supervision</vocabulary>. If anything goes wrong it will be blamed on him! He has to keep a close watch on them!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
